from pyspark.sql.window import Window

def extract_one_defid(defid: int):
    # Filter to one DefID
    d = dfv_good.filter(F.col("DefID") == F.lit(defid))

    # Keep latest VerNum per (ID, AttrID)
    w = Window.partitionBy("ID", "AttrID").orderBy(F.col("VerNum").desc())
    d_latest = (
        d.withColumn("rn", F.row_number().over(w))
         .filter(F.col("rn") == 1)
         .drop("rn", "VerNum", "DefID")
    )

    # Pivot to wide table (1 row per ID)
    wide = (
        d_latest
        .groupBy("ID")
        .pivot("AttrID")
        .agg(F.first("Value"))
    )

    # Write out
    out = f"{output_base}/DefID={defid}"
    wide.write.mode("overwrite").option("header", True).csv(out)

    print(f"Wrote DefID {defid} -> {out}")
